description: The file is an HTML webpage for a Database Viewer application, providing a user interface to browse databases, tables, and display data with interactive features.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of available databases.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list when the user clicks the refresh button.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database's table list.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a specific database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs an HTML table to display data rows.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates a table cell with proper rendering for different data types, including expandable objects or long content.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a table cell to show full content or truncated view.
